name: ride-vscode
description: Waves Ride language for Visual Studio Code
author: wavesplatform

rideExtention.languageServer.maxNumberOf.description: Controls the maximum number of problems produced by the server.

rideExtention.LanguageServer.trace.serve.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

rideExtention.repl.SEED.default: our default example seed for ride extention plugin inside visual studio code
rideExtention.repl.SEED.description: Seed phrase that is used to create keypair. This keypair will be used as default inside REPL

rideExtention.repl.CHAIN_ID.description: Network byte. 'T' for testnet, 'W' for mainnet

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd extention && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run compile:extention && npm run compile:server
scripts.postinstall: cd extention && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
